SimpleDatabaseInput.QueryString: SELECT vc.ipcode AS IPCODE FROM bp_ae.lw_pointtransaction pt INNER JOIN bp_ae.lw_pointevent pe ON pt.pointeventid = pe.pointeventid INNER JOIN bp_ae.lw_pointtype p ON pt.pointtypeid = p.pointtypeid INNER JOIN bp_ae.lw_virtualcard vc ON pt.vckey = vc.vckey INNER JOIN bp_ae.ats_memberdetails md ON vc.ipcode = md.a_ipcode WHERE 1 = 1 AND ( ( (pe.name IN ('Bra Purchase - 1', 'Bra Purchase - 15')) AND (pt.transactiondate < (SYSDATE - 15))) OR pe.name IN ('Bra Return')) AND p.name IN ('Bra Points') AND NVL (md.a_employeecode, 0) = 0 AND NVL (md.a_addressmailable, 0) = 1 AND pt.pointsconsumed = 0 AND pt.transactiontype <> 4 AND pt.expirationdate > SYSDATE GROUP BY vc.ipcode HAVING SUM (pt.points) >= 5
